text: Smarana karo! Allah balalena -- ''he isa, ami niscaya'i tomara mrtyu ghataba, ebam ami tomake amara dike unnita karabo, ara tomake parisodhita karabo yara abisbasa posana kare tadera theke, ara yara tomaya anusarana karabe tadera ami sthana debo yara abisbasa posana kare tadera upare kiyamatera dina paryanta, erapara amara'i kache tomadera pratyabartana sthana, ara ami tomadera madhye bicara karabo ye-bisaye tomara matabheda karachile se'i bisaye.
